name: LD 49 - Unstable
description:
This LD seemed to be attended by a team of 4 people. In the end, however, it turned out that I participated alone. I myself who have no feeling for graphics, music and during programming I only write mistakes. In the end, however, I managed to make a simple game and even managed to submit it to the Compo variant. But I wish my whole team could be at the next LD.

It may be interesting that in the whole game you will not find any 3D object other than a cube.

** About the game:** 

It is about collecting as many points as possible in an environment that is obviously unstable. It doesn't make deeper sense, but I can think of several features that would move the game to a completely different level. But 48 hours is not enough for these features.

** Background music: ** 

"It feels good to be alive too" - Loyalty Freak Music

https://www.chosic.com/free-music/all/

** Controlls:** 

- mouse in the menu

- Arrows to move
